verses.name: 2 Chronicles 30:19
verses.text: That prepareth his heart to seek God, the Lord God of his fathers, though he be not cleansed according to the purification of the sanctuary.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 30:20
verses.text: And the Lord hearkened to Hezekiah, and healed the people.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 30:21
verses.text: And the children of Israel that were present at Jerusalem kept the feast of unleavened bread seven days with great gladness: and the Levites and the priests praised the Lord day by day, singing with loud instruments unto the Lord.
